markets.question: Will Donald Trump win the 2024 US Presidential election?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Donald Trump is elected President in November 2024

markets.question: Will Bitcoin reach $100,000 by end of 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Bitcoin (BTC/USD) trades at or above $100,000 on any major exchange before December 31, 2024

markets.question: Will OpenAI release GPT-5 in 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if OpenAI publicly releases a model officially named GPT-5 before end of 2024

markets.question: Will interest rates be cut by the Fed in Q2 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Federal Reserve cuts interest rates at any meeting between April-June 2024

markets.question: Will Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce announce engagement by June 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if official engagement announcement is made by either party or confirmed by reliable sources

markets.question: Will Russia and Ukraine sign a ceasefire agreement in 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if both parties sign a formal ceasefire or peace agreement

markets.question: Will SpaceX successfully land humans on Mars by 2026?
markets.description: Resolves YES if SpaceX lands humans on Martian surface before end of 2026

markets.question: Will Apple announce a foldable iPhone in 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Apple officially announces a foldable iPhone at any event in 2024

markets.question: Will Manchester City win the Premier League 2023-24 season?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Manchester City finishes first in Premier League standings

markets.question: Will unemployment rate exceed 5% in US by end of 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if official BLS unemployment rate is 5.0% or higher for any month in 2024

markets.question: Will a major AI company be sued for copyright violation in 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, or Microsoft faces lawsuit filed by major publisher/studio

markets.question: Will Ethereum transition to full proof-of-stake by Q3 2024?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Ethereum completes all planned PoS upgrades by September 30, 2024
